Interpolate BoM Précis Daily Forecast Data That Have Been Downscaled to Hourly

Interpolate BoM Précis Daily Forecast Data That Have Been Downscaled to Hourly

interpolate_hourly(downscaled_temp)

Arguments

downscaled_temp

Hourly temperature data from make_hourly_forecast

Details

Interpolates forecast data that have been downscaled using the make_hourly_forecast function and returns a list of hourly #' surfaces for the next six-days forecast at 250x250m resolution. List names are the Julian day followed by the hour, e.g., "316.1" being the 316th day of the year and the first hour of the 24 hours.

Examples



# NOT RUN {
Qld_weather <- interpolate_hourly(x)
# }
